tool_description: This api returns various kinds of Beverages and Desserts
name: Beverages and Desserts
title: Beverages and Desserts

api_list.name: Get Desserts by there Id
Get Beverage by there Id
Get all the Desserts
api_list.description: This endpoint will returns all the** Desserts**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/desserts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
